ctu_text: A copy of such consent letter should be enclosed with the application. \n**Note 02:** In this connection, a suggestive list of Indian academic and R&amp;D institutions has been enclosed with this Announcement to help the applicant, but the applicant is free to contact any other institution in India for his/her affiliation. \n**Note 03:** Securing prior consent from an Indian institution/scientist does not guarantee the selection of an applicant. All applications received shall be scrutinized scientifically by DST.
